DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Evaluation Interval Begin Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the clinical trial reporting period started represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Domain Adverse Event Evaluation Interval Begin
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to an adverse event._Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s)._The period of time during which an evaluation was performed._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to an adverse event.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2744943 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
